name: chronoframe
description: Chronoframe is a self-hosted time tracking and productivity tool designed to help users monitor how they spend their time across tasks. It features task categorization, analytics, and a web interface for easy management.
features: Time Tracking: Monitor how you spend time across tasks. Productivity insights.
Task Categorization: Organize time by projects and categories. Smart organization.
Analytics Dashboard: Visualize time usage with charts and reports. Understand patterns.
Productivity Tool: Improve time management and efficiency. Work smarter.
Web Interface: Track time from any browser. Accessible anywhere.
Self-Hosted: Keep your time data completely private. Personal analytics.
